Classes

class  sdet_region_proc

Detailed Description

a processor for extracting expanded resolution regions

edgel_regions uses a flood fill algorithm and is thus region labeling is only as localized as one pixel.

Author:
J.L. Mundy - April 11, 2001
   Modifications
    8 May 2002 - Peter Vanroose - class name changed from region_proc to sdet_region_proc
